price: Indeed, He knows what is said openly and knows what you conceal.
arabic: إِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تَكۡتُمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
